data.name: AddStandardAlbum.Help
data.value:
1. Only empty albums can be used as parent albums.
  2. The parent album option may not be available depending on your choosen presentation.
  3. The first image uploaded to this album will be used as logo.

data.name: ParentAlbum.Help
data.value: The parent album of this new created album

data.name: NoParentAlbum.Text
data.value: No parent, place in gallery root

data.name: Title.Help
data.value: You may enter a short title when work with specific presentations

data.name: Title.Watermark
data.value: Required, keep it short and descriptive

data.name: Decription.Help
data.value: Enter a short description for this album, some presentations does not use this field

data.name: Description.Watermark
data.value: Optional, may not be visible to the end user

data.name: ShowOptionsDetail.Text
data.value: Click here if you understand this section and wish to change it.

data.name: ServerFolder.Help
data.value: UMG assign a unique folder to each album, all files of this album will be stored here.

data.name: ThumbnailSize.Help
data.value: The resolution of the automatically-generated thumbnails

data.name: AutoResize.Help
data.value: When enabled, images larger than this will be resized down automatically

data.name: Owner.Help
data.value: Album owner always has full permissions on this album. You can enter the first 2 characters of a user name or email address, then choose an user from the list.

data.name: ViewRoles.Help
data.value: Users who can view this album

data.name: ManageRoles.Help
data.value: Users who can manage existing medias

data.name: ApprovalRoles.Help
data.value: Users who can moderate pending medias

data.name: DefaultAlbum.Help
data.value: Mark it as the default album in this gallery

data.name: NeedApproval.Help
data.value: Photos in this album need to be approved

data.name: ResizedDown.Text
data.value: oversized images will be resized down

data.name: MayBeCropped.Text
data.value: Thumbnails may be cropped when have different aspect ratio
